member.name: T:AstroMath.AstroFormula

member.name: M:AstroMath.AstroFormula.MeasureStarVelocity(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Star Velocity: To measure the Star velocity using the Doppler shift.
member.returns: Return a double which represents the velocity in metres per second.

member.name: M:AstroMath.AstroFormula.MeasureStarDistance(System.Double)
member.summary: Star Distance: To measure the star distance using the parallax angle. The parallax angle is measured at two different points and works on nearby stars.
member.returns: Return a double value Distance in parsecs.

member.name: M:AstroMath.AstroFormula.MeasureTemperature(System.Double)
member.summary: Temperature in Kelvin: The Kelvin temperature scale is the primary temperature used in science and is easily converted from Celsius.
member.param: Temperature in Celsius of type double.
member.returns: Return a double which is the temperature in degrees Kelvin and must be greater than 0.

member.name: M:AstroMath.AstroFormula.MeasureEventHorizon(System.Double,System.Int32)
